com.ojcoleman.europa.util

Class Stringer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ojcoleman.europa.util.Stringer

  • public class Stringer
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class that attempts to convert generic objects into human-readable strings.
    Author:
    O. J. Coleman

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Stringer() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String toString(java.lang.Object obj)
      Convert an object to a pretty-printed JSON-esque string, with automatic recursive handling of arrays, Iterable, Map and Stringable objects.
      static java.lang.String toString(java.lang.Object obj, int maxLevel)
      Convert an object to a to a pretty-printed JSON-esque string, with automatic recursive handling of arrays, Iterable, Map and Stringable objects.
      static java.lang.String toString(java.lang.Object obj, int maxLevel, int initialLevel)
      Convert an object to a to a pretty-printed JSON-esque string, with automatic recursive handling of arrays, Iterable, Map and Stringable objects.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public static java.lang.String toString(java.lang.Object obj)
        Convert an object to a pretty-printed JSON-esque string, with automatic recursive handling of arrays, Iterable, Map and Stringable objects. Recursion will only go 5 levels deep.
        Parameters:
        obj - The object to convert to a String.

      • toString

        public static java.lang.String toString(java.lang.Object obj,
                        int maxLevel)
        Convert an object to a to a pretty-printed JSON-esque string, with automatic recursive handling of arrays, Iterable, Map and Stringable objects.
        Parameters:
        obj - The object to convert to a String.
        maxLevel - The maximum recursion level. -1 for no limit.

      • toString

        public static java.lang.String toString(java.lang.Object obj,
                        int maxLevel,
                        int initialLevel)
        Convert an object to a to a pretty-printed JSON-esque string, with automatic recursive handling of arrays, Iterable, Map and Stringable objects.
        Parameters:
        obj - The object to convert to a String.
        maxLevel - The maximum recursion level. -1 for no limit.
        initialLevel - The initial indentation level.
